title: BUG: Exception: The passed model is not callable and cannot be analyzed directly with the given masker! Model: GBTClassificationModel (uid=GBTClassifier_c6502ed2671a) with 100 trees

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Indicates an unexpected problem or unintended behaviour

body:
### Issue Description

I`ve loaded a GBTCLassifierModel from hdfs, and I get the folling exception:

```bash
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Exception                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
*/shaply.py in ()
----> 1 explainer=shap.Explainer(model)

/opt/cloudera/parcels/Anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/explainers/_explainer.py in __init__(self, model, masker, link, algorithm, output_names, feature_names, **kwargs)
    128                 # if we get here then we don't know how to handle what was given to us
    129                 else:
--> 130                     raise Exception("The passed model is not callable and cannot be analyzed directly with the given masker! Model: " + str(model))
    131 
    132             # build the right subclass

Exception: The passed model is not callable and cannot be analyzed directly with the given masker! Model: GBTClassificationModel (uid=GBTClassifier_c6502ed2671a) with 100 trees
```

### Minimal Reproducible Example

```python
pipeline=PipelineModel.load(ruta_pipeline_hdfs)
model=pipeline.stages[-1]

explainer=shap.Explainer(model)
```


### Expected Behavior

It should works as I train GBTClassifierModel without saving of loading and it works.

### Bug report checklist

- [X] I have checked that this issue has not already been reported.
- [X] I have confirmed this bug exists on the [latest release](https://github.com/shap/shap/releases) of shap.
- [X] I have confirmed this bug exists on the [master branch](https://github.com/shap/shap/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#installing-from-the-master-branch) of shap.
- [x] I'd be interested in making a PR to fix this bug

### Installed Versions

Latest
